# Problem 1

## How many aisles are there, and which aisles are the most items ordered from?
```{r}
aisle_counts=
  instacart %>% 
  group_by(aisle) %>% 
  summarize(
    n_obs=n()
  ) %>% 
  arrange(-n_obs)
```

```{r}
ggplot
```
